casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Richard D. EHRLICH (Deceased) (Jonathan Ehrlich - Petitioner) C-491 September Term 2018
081407 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 18, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002147-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
